alert.note: Alert for Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm and outflow will impact portions of north central Cameron and south central Willacy Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rio Hondo Elementary School, or near Arroyo City, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Rio Hondo, Rio Hondo Elementary School, Rio Hondo High School, Santa Monica, Rio Hondo City Hall, Rio Hondo Junior High School, Valley International Airport, Mccloud Hood Reservoir and Montgomery Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
